segments.text: What position have you held before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you tell me the general description of your present job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am in charge of the trading department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What made you decide to change your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m working in a small company where further promotion is impossible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you leave your present company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I never easily give up something that is valuable . Before I decided to quit that position , I had made a thorough analysis of things like what I would gain and what I would lose here in your company . You know , Shanghai is always a fascinating place to me , full of challenges as well as hopes . In addition to this , I have the specialized knowledge and the necessary experience of making a good . Of course , opportunities to work abroad and a higher salary are also important to me . So I believe it ’ s worthwhile to come here to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you pick this organization ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very much interested in the position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What made you decide to join our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe I would have better opportunities with a small but rapidly expanding company like yours .
segments.speaker: S2
